title: MBA
description: Matrix-Based Analysis Program through Bayesian Multilevel Modeling

chains.title: Chains
chains.description: Specify the number of Markov chains

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: Specify the number of iterations per Markov chain

model.title: Model
model.description: Specify the effects associated with explanatory variables

eoi.title: Effects of Interest
eoi.description: Identify effects of interest in the output

data_table.title: Data table
data_table.description: Specify the data structure in a table of long format

qcvar.title: Quantitative Comparisons
qcvar.description: Identify comparisons of interest between quantitative variables

stdz.title: Standardize Variables
stdz.description: Identify quantitative variables (or covariates) to be standardized

wcp.title: Within-Chain Parallelization
wcp.description: Invoke within-chain parallelization to speed up runtime

disty.title: Distribution for Response Variable
disty.description: Specify the distribution for the response variable

se.title: Standard Error
se.description: Specify the column name that designates the standard error for the response variable

dbgArgs.title: Debug Arguments
dbgArgs.description: Enable R to save the parameters in a file called .MBA.dbg.AFNI.args for debugging purposes
